FuncDef: The hard-zoning enable command enables the iNOF zone isolation function. The undo hard-zoning enable command disables the iNOF zone isolation function. By default, the iNOF zone isolation function is disabled. This command is supported only on the CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P and CE8850-HAM.
ExtraInfo: After iNOF zone isolation takes effect, inter-zone host communication is restricted.
